name: Haruka: Beyond the Stream of Time
name_original: Haruka: Beyond the Stream of Time
description:
Harukanaru Toki no Naka de (遙かなる時空の中で, lit. "Within the Expanse of a Distant Time") is an otome adventure game developed by Ruby Party and published by Koei. It is a part of Ruby Party's Neoromance label.

Because of Harukanaru Toki no Naka de's success, the game has given rise to a franchise including several sequels, numerous drama and music CDs, a manga series, two OAVs, a movie, and an anime television series, and a live-action theatrical.
